name: Sacred Flame
description:
Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take <button class="roll" data-name="Radiant Damage" data-expression="1d8">1d8 radiant damage</button>.

The spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (<button class="roll" data-name="Radiant Damage" data-expression="2d8">2d8</button>), 11th level (<button class="roll" data-name="Radiant Damage" data-expression="3d8">3d8</button>), and 17th level (<button class="roll" data-name="Radiant Damage" data-expression="4d8">4d8</button>).
